titles: Reflexions upon the oathes of supremacy and allegiance by a Catholick gentleman, and obedient son of the church, and loyal subject of His Majesty.
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: Attributed to John Sergeant by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Also attributed to John Austin and Hugh Paulinus Cressy--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
